line_2: He rose, high mounting o'er the heaving waves;

line_1: The other still his lovely burden saves,
line_2: Though strong the billows beat, and fierce the tempest raves.

line_1: Shall bloom like that, she from oblivion saves.
line_2: Be found, amidst some distant frozen waves,

line_1: If Laron hears the Cry, he often saves,
line_2: And buoys the floating Wretch amidst the angry Waves.

line_1: He saves from famine, from the savage saves;
line_2: That very life his learned hunger craves,

line_1: Shall raise. Thrice happy he! who without Rigour saves.
line_2: Those Men, those wretched Men! who will be Slaves,

line_1: Shall raise. Thrice happy he! who without Rigour saves.
line_2: But some there be, thy Song, as from their Graves,

line_1: When Erskine's wit the culprit-client saves,
line_2: And fraud unscourged offended justice braves;

line_1: Him NEPTUNE sunk, and me unkindly saves;
line_2: Not so my FELIX scap'd the raging Waves;
